name: This is You (Madness Day 2021)
description:
(psst! if you like the game, why not rate it over on Newgrounds?)

Welcome to the A.A.H.W!

This Is You is a short visual novel about you! You're a grunt that's just woken up after spending all of their life inside a tube, and you're experiencing the world for the first time! Something's amiss, though...

Why did you wake up early? Why is it such a big deal, anyway? What's with Dr. Graves? Are you going to get answers to any of those? Probably not! No one's telling you anything.

Controls

You can choose whether to tap the spacebar or click your way through dialogue, but choices must be selected with the mouse.
